export-info: Store this somewhere to import it later.
import-info: Paste your backed up data to restore it.
help-full:
Dofus Quests is a tool allowing you to track your progression through the quests and achievements of Dofus. Its main feature is a visualisation of the dependencies between the various quests, allowing you to easily understand in which order to complete them to reach a certain objective. Achievements are grouped by categories, making it easier to read.

Controls:
  • Mark a quest/achievement as completed: right click.
  • Mark a quest/achievement and its prerequisites: shift + right click
  • Details of a quest/achievement: left click
Dofus Quests also has its Almanax tracker, where you can mark the days when the offering has been made.

This site does not store any cookies or tracking; your progression is saved locally. You can export your data via the left menu to keep it aside and to re-import it later or on another device.

If you have any questions, suggestions or bugs to report, feel free to contact me via Twitter! Thank you for using Dofus Quests :)

- N1ark
